dct_title_s: Communicatio Maris Mediterranei et quod mortuum dicunt cum Mari Rubro
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text (in Dutch): De onder-aardse wereld...
Appears in Kircher, Athanasius, Mundus subterraneus ... Amsterdam, Joannem Janssonium Ã  Waesberge & Viduam Elizaei Weyerstraet, 1668, Vol. I, p.88.
